settings.accordion-content:
Delicious daily routine that gives you instant calm & lasting bliss

  • Instant, natural calm
  • Mental clarity & emotional balance
  • Delicious hydration
  • Antioxidant & anti-inflammatory protection
  • Inner radiance & glow

Delicate, floral, and subtly sweet ‚Äî like sipping calm itself. A hint of rose, a touch of honeyed warmth, and a smooth finish that lingers like serenity.

Its taste and aroma aren‚Äôt just exquisite ‚Äî they‚Äôre part of the magic.

The scent and flavor of the Bulgarian Rose naturally soothe the senses and calm the mind, turning every sip into a gentle reset.

Behind every drop of Rose Nectar lies the natural chemistry of calm.

The Bulgarian Rose is uniquely rich in aromatic compounds like citronellol, geraniol, and phenylethyl alcohol ‚Äî molecules that interact directly with the brain‚Äôs emotional centers to ease tension and restore focus.

These active constituents help the body regulate its stress response, promoting a balanced, centered state without sedation.

Through gentle extraction, Rose Nectar preserves the rose‚Äôs delicate bioactive profile, delivering both its calming aroma and antioxidant richness in a pure, ingestible form.

The result is calm that feels immediate ‚Äî and emotional well-being that lasts.

100% pure and Organic Bulgarian Rose extract - naturally rich in calming aromatic compounds and antioxidant polyphenols.

No additives, no preservatives, no artificial flavors

Zero sugar. Zero calories.

Add 1‚Äì2 teaspoons of Rose Nectar to still or sparkling water, tea, matcha, or your favorite drink ‚Äî even wine or champagne for a touch of calm indulgence.

Enjoy it hot or cold ‚Äî the taste and benefits stay perfectly intact.

Make it your morning ritual, mid-day reset, or evening wind-down ‚Äî a daily ritual for lasting balance and harmony.

üåø USING & STORING

How should I store it?

Keep your Rose Nectar in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.

Refrigeration isn‚Äôt required, but can help extend shelf life ‚Äî especially once opened.

Most importantly, keep it somewhere you‚Äôll see it and use it daily ‚Äî your calm works best as a ritual, not an afterthought.

Can I add it to hot drinks?

Yes ‚Äî the quality and benefits remain perfectly intact in both hot and cold beverages.

Add it to tea, matcha, or any warm drink and let the aroma bloom.

Serving size

Each serving is ¬º oz. We recommend at least 1 tablespoon daily (2 servings) ‚Äî ideal for an 8‚Äì32 oz drink.

Adjust to taste and mood ‚Äî lighter for a hint, richer for a deeper calm.

How long does a 64 servings bottle last?

Typically ~4 weeks, depending on how you enjoy it.

Some customers add it once a day to their favorite drink; others use it multiple times throughout the day.

Some prefer a light daily dose; others savor a richer blend for deeper calm & indulgence.

üå∏ PRODUCT & INGREDIENTS

What‚Äôs the difference between Rose Nectar and rose water?

Most rose waters are generic ‚Äî made for skincare or diluted drinks ‚Äî and lack the full depth of the rose‚Äôs natural chemistry.

Rose Nectar isn‚Äôt just different ‚Äî it‚Äôs the only product handcrafted specifically for ingestion and emotional well-being.

It‚Äôs far richer in aromatic terpenes & antioxidant polyphenols, the compounds behind the rose‚Äôs calming, restorative power.

Each batch is crafted to deliver the perfect harmony of taste and aroma ‚Äî a pure, concentrated expression of the Bulgarian rose in its most potent, delicious form.

Does it contain sugar or additives?

No. Rose Nectar has a very subtle natural sweetness from the rose itself ‚Äî with no added sugar, preservatives, or artificial ingredients.

What does ‚Äúhandcrafted‚Äù really mean?

Each batch is made in small quantities from fresh Bulgarian Roses.

The flowers are at dawn during only 3 weeks per year in late spring and early summer, and gently extracted to preserve their aroma, nutrients, and calming energy.

Can I mix it with other supplements or adaptogens?

Yes ‚Äî Rose Nectar pairs beautifully with most natural tonics, adaptogens, and wellness blends.

Its delicate floral flavor complements rather than overpowers, creating balance in every mix.

Can I take it during pregnancy?

We‚Äôre unable to provide medical advice.

Please consult your healthcare provider before using any botanical product during pregnancy.

Is it safe for kids?

Rose Nectar is made from pure, food-grade Rosa Damascena ‚Äî a flower used in foods for centuries.

However, we recommend consulting your pediatrician before introducing any new botanical product to children.

Can I be allergic to Rose Nectar?

While true allergies to Rosa Damascena are rare, everyone‚Äôs body is unique, and sensitivities to botanicals can happen.

Rose Nectar is 100% pure and food-grade, with no synthetic additives ‚Äî but if you have a history of floral or essential oil sensitivities, we recommend starting with a small amount first.

If you notice any reaction ‚Äî such as redness, itching, or digestive discomfort ‚Äî discontinue use and consult your healthcare provider.

Calm should always feel good ‚Äî and your comfort comes first.

‚ú® OREDERS & SUBSCRIPTIONS

What‚Äôs the best way to save?

The best way to save ‚Äî and to never run out of calm ‚Äî is through a Rose Nectar subscription.

Subscribers always come first when quantities are limited.

It‚Äôs fully flexible ‚Äî you can pause, cancel, or adjust your delivery frequency anytime with just a click.

Simple, stress-free, and designed to keep your calm ritual uninterrupted.

How much is shipping?

Shipping in the US is between $4.95 and $6.95. For orders over $99, US shipping is free.
